name: th-suite
description: TransHub Suite - 本地化工具套件，支持Minecraft、RimWorld等游戏的模组和资源包自动化翻译工作流程

scripts.dev:mc_l10n: cd apps/mc_l10n/frontend && npm run tauri dev
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:protocol && npm run build:ui-kit
scripts.build:mc_l10n: cd apps/mc_l10n/frontend && npm run tauri build
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:packages && npm run install:apps
scripts.install:packages: cd packages/protocol && npm install && cd ../ui-kit && npm install
scripts.install:python: npm run install:python:mc && npm run install:python:rw
scripts.clean: npm run clean:packages && npm run clean:apps
scripts.clean:packages: cd packages/protocol && npm run clean && cd ../ui-kit && npm run clean
scripts.lint: npm run lint:packages && npm run lint:apps
scripts.lint:packages: cd packages/protocol && npm run lint && cd ../ui-kit && npm run lint
scripts.lint:python: npm run lint:python:mc && npm run lint:python:rw
scripts.test: npm run test:packages && npm run test:apps
scripts.test:python: npm run test:python:mc && npm run test:python:rw
scripts.format: npm run format:packages && npm run format:apps
scripts.format:python: npm run format:python:mc && npm run format:python:rw

author: Saken
